bug.short_desc: Password field for RDP is limited to 20 characters
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: When connecting to windows servers or workstations, passwords that exceed 20 characters cannot be entered
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 3.20.2
How reproducible:
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Create a password exceeding 20 characters for a windows server. 2. Try connecting to the windows servers from vinagre with the password that contains more than 20 characters 3.
Actual results: The authentication will fail because windows will not receive the correct password
Expected results: To be able to accept long pass phrase.
Additional info:
